verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> words דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> of David הָאַֽחֲרֹנִ֑ים <S%H314><s%> Now these [be] the last נְאֻ֧ם <S%H5002><s%> said דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> David בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִשַׁ֗י <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse וּנְאֻ֤ם <S%H5002><s%> said הַגֶּ֙בֶר֙ <S%H1397><s%> and the man הֻ֣קַם <S%H6965><s%> [who was] raised up עָ֔ל <S%H5920><s%> on high מְשִׁ֙יחַ֙ <S%H4899><s%> the anointed אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> of the God יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וּנְעִ֖ים <S%H5273><s%> and the sweet זְמִר֥וֹת <S%H2158><s%> psalmist יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> The Spirit יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> spake בִּ֑י וּמִלָּת֖וֹ <S%H4405><s%> by me and his word עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was on לְשׁוֹנִֽי׃ <S%H3956><s%> [was] in my tongue

אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> The God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לִ֥י דִבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> spake צ֣וּר <S%H6697><s%> the Rock יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מוֹשֵׁל֙ <S%H4910><s%> to me He that ruleth בָּאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> over men צַדִּ֕יק <S%H6662><s%> [must be] just מוֹשֵׁ֖ל <S%H4910><s%> ruling יִרְאַ֥ת <S%H3374><s%> in the fear אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וּכְא֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> And [he shall be] as the light בֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> of the morning יִזְרַח־ <S%H2224><s%> riseth שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> [when] the sun בֹּ֚קֶר <S%H1242><s%> [even] a morning לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without עָב֔וֹת <S%H5645><s%> clouds מִנֹּ֥גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> by clear shining מִמָּטָ֖ר <S%H4306><s%> after rain דֶּ֥שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> [as] the tender grass מֵאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> [springing] out of the earth

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Truly לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not כֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so בֵּיתִ֖י <S%H1004><s%> Although my house עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> [be] not so with God כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> indeed בְרִ֨ית <S%H1285><s%> covenant עוֹלָ֜ם <S%H5769><s%> with me an everlasting שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> yet he hath made לִ֗י עֲרוּכָ֤ה <S%H6186><s%> ordered בַכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all וּשְׁמֻרָ֔ה <S%H8104><s%> in all [things] and sure כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> indeed כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> things יִשְׁעִ֥י <S%H3468><s%> for [this is] all my salvation וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all חֵ֖פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> and all [my] desire כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> indeed לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> make not יַצְמִֽיחַ׃ <S%H6779><s%> although he make [it] not to grow

וּבְלִיַּ֕עַל <S%H1100><s%> But [the sons] of Belial כְּק֥וֹץ <S%H6975><s%> [shall be] all of them as thorns מֻנָ֖ד <S%H5074><s%> thrust away כֻּלָּ֑הַם <S%H3605><s%> every כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cannot בְיָ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> with hands יִקָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> because they cannot be taken

וְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> But the man יִגַּ֣ע <S%H5060><s%> [that] shall touch בָּהֶ֔ם יִמָּלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> them must be fenced בַרְזֶ֖ל <S%H1270><s%> with iron וְעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> and the staff חֲנִ֑ית <S%H2595><s%> of a spear וּבָאֵ֕שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire שָׂר֥וֹף <S%H8313><s%> and they shall be utterly יִשָּׂרְפ֖וּ <S%H8313><s%> burned בַּשָּֽׁבֶת׃ <S%H7675><s%> in the [same] place פ

אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמ֥וֹת <S%H8034><s%> These [be] the names הַגִּבֹּרִ֖ים <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> whom David יֹשֵׁ֨ב <S%H3427><s%> that sat בַּשֶּׁ֜בֶת <S%H7675><s%> place תַּחְכְּמֹנִ֣י ׀ <S%H8461><s%> had The Tachmonite רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> chief הַשָּׁלִשִׁ֗י <S%H7991><s%> among the captains ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עֲדִינ֣וֹ <S%H5722><s%> the same [was] Adino [הָעֶצְנֹו כ] (הָֽעֶצְנִ֔י <S%H6112><s%> Eznite ק) עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> [he lift up his spear] against eight מֵא֛וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred חָלָ֖ל <S%H2491><s%> whom he slew בְּפַ֥עַם <S%H6471><s%> time [אֶחָד כ] (אֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> a ק) ס

[וְאַחֲרֹו כ] (וְאַחֲרָ֛יו <S%H310><s%> after that ק) אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <S%H499><s%> him [was] Eleazar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son [דֹּדִי כ] (דֹּדֹ֖ו <S%H1734><s%> Dodo ק) בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחֹחִ֑י <S%H266><s%> the Ahohite בִּשְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <S%H7969><s%> [one] of the three [גִּבֹּרִים כ] (הַגִּבֹּרִ֜ים <S%H1368><s%> champion ק) עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> with David בְּחָֽרְפָ֤ם <S%H2778><s%> when they defied בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines נֶאֶסְפוּ־ <S%H622><s%> [that] were there gathered together שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> to battle וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> were gone away אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and the men יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> He קָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> He arose וַיַּ֨ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and smote בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines עַ֣ד ׀ <S%H5704><s%> against כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> until יָגְעָ֣ה <S%H3021><s%> was weary יָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וַתִּדְבַּ֤ק <S%H1692><s%> clave יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> and his hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> unto the sword וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> wrought יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <S%H8668><s%> victory גְדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> a great בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people יָשֻׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> returned אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> after אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> only לְפַשֵּֽׁט׃ <S%H6584><s%> him only to spoil ס

וְאַחֲרָ֛יו <S%H310><s%> And after שַׁמָּ֥א <S%H8037><s%> Shamma בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָגֵ֖א <S%H89><s%> of Agee הָרָרִ֑י <S%H2043><s%> the Hararite וַיֵּאָסְפ֨וּ <S%H622><s%> were gathered together פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines לַחַיָּ֗ה <S%H2416><s%> into a troop וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> where חֶלְקַ֤ת <S%H2513><s%> where was a piece הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> of ground מְלֵאָ֣ה <S%H4395><s%> fruit עֲדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H5742><s%> of lentiles וְהָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people נָ֖ס <S%H5127><s%> fled מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines

וַיִּתְיַצֵּ֤ב <S%H3320><s%> But he stood בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַֽחֶלְקָה֙ <S%H2513><s%> of the ground וַיַּצִּילֶ֔הָ <S%H5337><s%> and defended וַיַּ֖ךְ <S%H5221><s%> it and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> wrought יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <S%H8668><s%> victory גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> a great ס

וַיֵּרְד֨וּ <S%H3381><s%> went down [שְׁלֹשִׁים כ] (שְׁלֹשָׁ֜ה <S%H7970><s%> of the thirty ק) מֵהַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> of the thirty רֹ֗אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> chief וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in קָצִיר֙ <S%H7105><s%> in the harvest time אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> to David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְעָרַ֖ת <S%H4631><s%> unto the cave עֲדֻלָּ֑ם <S%H5725><s%> of Adullam וְחַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> and the troop פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines חֹנָ֖ה <S%H2583><s%> pitched בְּעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <S%H7497><s%> of Rephaim

וְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> was then בַּמְּצוּדָ֑ה <S%H4686><s%> [was] then in an hold וּמַצַּ֣ב <S%H4673><s%> and the garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> was then בֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> [was] then [in] Bethlehem

וַיִּתְאַוֶּ֥ה <S%H183><s%> longed דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> And David וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said מִ֚י <S%H4310><s%> Oh יַשְׁקֵ֣נִי <S%H8248><s%> Oh that one would give me drink מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the water מִבֹּ֥אר <S%H877><s%> the well בֵּֽית־ לֶ֖חֶם <S%H1035><s%> of Bethlehem אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <S%H8179><s%> which [is] by the gate

וַיִּבְקְעוּ֩ <S%H1234><s%> brake through שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> And the three הַגִּבֹּרִ֜ים <S%H1368><s%> mighty men בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיִּֽשְׁאֲבוּ־ <S%H7579><s%> and drew מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> water מִבֹּ֤אר <S%H877><s%> the well בֵּֽית־ לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H1035><s%> of Bethlehem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> that [was] by the gate וַיִּשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> and took וַיָּבִ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> [it] and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> [it] to David וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not אָבָה֙ <S%H14><s%> nevertheless he would לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֔ם <S%H8354><s%> not drink וַיַּסֵּ֥ךְ <S%H5258><s%> thereof but poured it out אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said חָלִילָה֩ <S%H2486><s%> Be it far לִּ֨י יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> from me O LORD מֵעֲשֹׂ֣תִי <S%H6213><s%> that I should do זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הֲדַ֤ם <S%H1818><s%> this [is not this] the blood הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H582><s%> of the men הַהֹלְכִ֣ים <S%H1980><s%> that went בְּנַפְשׁוֹתָ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> any וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אָבָ֖ה <S%H14><s%> would לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֑ם <S%H8354><s%> not drink אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These עָשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> it These things did שְׁלֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> these three הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> mighty men ס

וַאֲבִישַׁ֞י <S%H52><s%> And Abishai אֲחִ֣י ׀ <S%H251><s%> the brother יוֹאָ֣ב <S%H3097><s%> of Joab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צְרוּיָ֗ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> was chief [הַשְּׁלֹשִׁי כ] (הַשְּׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <S%H7992><s%> third part ק) וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> and he עוֹרֵ֣ר <S%H5782><s%> And he lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲנִית֔וֹ <S%H2595><s%> his spear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> against three מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred חָלָ֑ל <S%H2491><s%> [and] slew וְלוֹ־ שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> [them] and had the name בַּשְּׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> among three

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> was most הַשְּׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> not unto the [first] three הֲכִ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for נִכְבָּ֔ד <S%H3513><s%> Was he not most honourable וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> became לָהֶ֖ם לְשָׂ֑ר <S%H8269><s%> their commander וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַשְּׁלֹשָׁ֖ה <S%H7969><s%> to the three לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not בָֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> howbeit he attained ס

וּבְנָיָ֨הוּ <S%H1141><s%> And Benaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֧ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man [חַי כ] (חַ֛יִל <S%H2416><s%> age ק) רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> who had done many פְּעָלִ֖ים <S%H6467><s%> acts מִֽקַּבְצְאֵ֑ל <S%H6909><s%> of Kabzeel ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הִכָּ֗ה <S%H5221><s%> he slew אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> two אֲרִאֵל֙ <S%H739><s%> lionlike men מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וְ֠הוּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָרַ֞ד <S%H3381><s%> he went down וְהִכָּ֧ה <S%H5221><s%> also and slew אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> [הָאֲרִיַּה כ] (הָאֲרִ֛י <S%H738><s%> lion ק) בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַבֹּ֖אר <S%H953><s%> of a pit בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in time הַשָּֽׁלֶג׃ <S%H7950><s%> of snow
